name: TankCraft
description: TankCraft is an action game based around gladiatorial style tank battles, but skill alone won't be enough to succeed here, the unique thing about TankCraft is the player crafts their own tanks however they choose with no restrictions to shapes, sizes or design.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Open GL 2+ Compliant DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
